markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Extinguish Light](/Feats.aspx?ID=2507) <actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Darkness" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=39" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Fetchling" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=300" />
<trait label="Occult" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=120" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 86 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Frequency**
once every 10 minutes

</column>

---

You wrap shadow around a single unattended light source within 120 feet that's no larger than a torch. Any non-magical light source you target is automatically extinguished. For magical light sources, attempt a [counteract](/Rules.aspx?ID=371) check using your Fortitude or [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=17) modifier against the target's DC. Your counteract level is equal to half your level rounded up. Successfully counteracting the light source suppresses its ability to produce light for 1 minute, but not any other effects. If you're in dim light or darkness when you Extinguish Light, its range is 240 feet.
name: Extinguish Light
